      • getInput

        public java.lang.String getInput()
                          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method must be executed in a separate THREAD from the Slick loop thread.
        Returns the String of the button option that was pressed.
        Returns:
        the String of the button option that was pressed
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if there is any problem waiting for the button press
